DataElement.preferredName: Medical Imaging Agent Radiopharmaceutical Stop DICOM Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Radiopharmaceutical Stop Time (0018,1073) is the actual ending time of radiopharmaceutical administration to the patient for imaging purposes, using the same time base as for the Acquisition Start Time (0008,0032).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Imaging Agent Radiopharmaceutical Stop Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The actual ending time of radiopharmaceutical administration to the patient for imaging purposes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In medicine, any technology which helps in visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for the screening, diagnosis, surgical procedure or therapy.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: In medicine, any technology which helps in visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for the screening, diagnosis, surgical procedure or therapy.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Put an end to a state or an activity.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: An agent that contains a radioactive isotope and is used for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/29/10 Released for use in Image SUV Calculation Module.  1/13/01 - revised OC to "image agent" per IMGCRF discussion.  1/4/2010 - created to support Image SUV CRF module.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: TM:  DICOM Time; A string of characters of the format hhmmss.frac; where hh (00-23); minutes (00-59); seconds (00-59); frac=fractional part "000000"-"999999"

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive set of standards for communications between medical imaging devices, including handling, storing and transmitting information in medical imaging. It includes a file format definition and a network communication protocol.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: A comprehensive set of standards for communications between medical imaging devices, including handling, storing and transmitting information in medical imaging. It includes a file format definition and a network communication protocol.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
